name: openvoxellauncher
description: A Minecraft Launcher for OpenVoxel Studios!

scripts.prepare-notdev: node -e "var old = require('./intern.json'); old.devMode = false; require('node:fs').writeFileSync('./intern.json', JSON.stringify(old, undefined, 2), { encoding: 'utf-8' });"
scripts.prepare-dev: node -e "var old = require('./intern.json'); old.devMode = true; require('node:fs').writeFileSync('./intern.json', JSON.stringify(old, undefined, 2), { encoding: 'utf-8' });"
scripts.dev: npm run prepare-dev && npm run electron
scripts.start: npm run prepare-notdev && npm run electron
scripts.build-mac: npm run prepare-notdev && npx electron-builder --mac --publish never && npm run clean-mac && npm run rename
scripts.build-win: npm run prepare-notdev && npx electron-builder --win --publish never && npm run clean-win && npm run rename
scripts.build-all: npm run build-mac && npm run build-win
scripts.testbuild-mac: npm run prepare-dev && npx electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.testbuild-win: npm run prepare-dev && npx electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.testbuild-all: npm run testbuild-mac && npm run testbuild-win
scripts.rename: cd ./dist && for file in OpenVoxel*; do mv "$file" "${file// /-}"; done && cd ../
scripts.makecertificate: mkdir certificates && cd certificates && openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -keyout key.pem -out request.csr && openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in request.csr -signkey key.pem -out certificate.pem && openssl pkcs12 -export -out certificate.pfx -inkey key.pem -in certificate.pem
